snippet: Decades ago, basketball players like George McGinnis, Mel Daniels and even Mike Woodson had next game at places like the Douglass Park Family Center gym in Indianapolis.
abstract: New York Knicks are preparing for away game against Indiana Pacers, which will be a homecoming for Knicks coach and Indianapolis native Mike Woodson; decades ago, Woodson and other future pros like former Pacers star George McGinnis honed their skills in high-level pickup games at city recreational centers like Douglass Park Family Center, where the area's top basketball talent congregated.

byline.contributor: Howard Beck contributed reporting from Indianapolis.

lead_paragraph: Decades ago, basketball players like George McGinnis, Mel Daniels and even Mike Woodson had next game at places like the Douglass Park Family Center gym in Indianapolis.

headline.seo: Recalling Indianapolis Pickup Games Worth the Wait
headline.main: In Indianapolis, Pickup Games With the Stars Were Worth the Wait
headline.print_headline: At Indianapolis Gyms, Pickup Games With Stars Were Worth the Wait
